thread.title: John L
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by John L

author: John L
title: John L
text:
I found Antique Lamp Supply to be very easy to deal with. I was searching on their web site for a particular color lamp shade for an old oil lamp.
I called customer service and their representative was very helpful in helping me locate it. I ordered it and it was at my home in 3 days. It came
securely wrapped in two boxes which I really appreciated.
